Node.Text: To the lobby. So, you must be the new guy. The one hired by the boss - oh, sorry, I mean ex-boss.
Sorry to hear that. But don't worry about it too much; from what I hear, this place offers a great salary! You'll get along just fine.
Is that so? I didn't know something like this would happen when I took the job, so that was a surprise, to say the least.
Most people that pass through here tend to have good luck. Be careful around the long-time residents here, though - I hear some of them are a bit crazy.
Thanks for the ride, sir. Have a good evening.
